pullrequest.title: Added ability to visualize COM, collisions, joints.

content.raw:
The visualization of collision models seems to be buggy when moving objects manually:  http://youtu.be/1MY6G74SEuo

Another interesting effect when using a more complex model: the visualized collision model can blow apart while the actual model is perfectly fine and shows a completely different behaviour: http://youtu.be/nhWXiPXioSQ
content.html:
The visualization of collision models seems to be buggy when moving objects manually: http://youtu.be/1MY6G74SEuo

Another interesting effect when using a more complex model: the visualized collision model can blow apart while the actual model is perfectly fine and shows a completely different behaviour: http://youtu.be/nhWXiPXioSQ
